title: Trigonometric Identities - sine sum with values

content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals sin open parentheses x plus fraction numerator 4 pi over denominator 3 end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What is the value of <math alttext="f open parentheses fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 4 end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator negative square root of 6 minus square root of 2 over denominator 4 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><mo>-</mo><msqrt><mn>6</mn></msqrt><mo>-</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator square root of 2 plus square root of 6 over denominator 4 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mn>6</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator square root of 2 minus square root of 6 over denominator 4 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>-</mo><msqrt><mn>6</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator square root of 6 minus square root of 2 over denominator 4 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mn>6</mn></msqrt><mo>-</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator square root of 6 minus square root of 2 over denominator 4 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mn>6</mn></msqrt><mo>-</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
